name: Xitcoin
description: Xitcoin ($XTC) is a decentralized token deployed on the Cronos blockchain, designed to enable secure and efficient digital transactions. With a focus on interoperability and scalability, Xitcoin aims to support a modular Web3 ecosystem. The project combines simplicity with long-term utility, as it prepares to integrate into its own native blockchain while remaining active on Cronos and other compatible networks through wrapped versions. This dual approach ensures adaptability, ecosystem growth, and cross-platform relevance.
